login: Please log in to your account
logout-success: You have been logged out successfully.
logout-fail: An error occurred while trying to log you out.
forgot-password-instructions: Enter the eMail address you originally registered with below and click send. You will then receive an eMail with a link to a page where you can reset your password.
reset-mail-success: The password reset email has been sent.
set-password-success: Your new password has been set successfully.
reset-success-copy: An eMail was sent to your address. Click the link contained in the eMail within the next hour to be forwarded to a page where you can reset your password.
reset-success-notice: The eMail should reach your inbox within a few minutes. Make sure to check your spam folder in case it does not.
reset-password-instructions: Please set a new password for your account.
reset-success: Your password was successfully reset. Please log in with your new credentials.
invalid-password-reset-instructions: Your password reset link is invalid or incomplete. If you manually copied the link from the email, make sure it is complete. Some mail clients also may put a line feed in the link and break it.
network-error: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection, reload the page and try again.
email-unknown: This eMail address is not registered in the system.
unknown-error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
login-timeout: The login attempt takes longer than expected. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
parameter-missing: Please enter a valid email address and password.
email-missing: Please enter a valid email address.
link-expired: The password reset link has expired or is not complete. Please try to reset your password again.
new-password-mismatch: The password confirmation does not match your new password.
gigya-not-loaded: Error loading required components. Please check your internet connection and deactivate any ad or script blockers.
